Package view

Interface ViewIF

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    View
    public interface ViewIF
    The interface for the GUI. The Controller handles GUI related traffic through this interface.
    Version:
    1.3 04.05.2021
    Author:
    Aki K, Tuomas R, Jere L, Ville R, Tatu N

      • setCards

        void setCards​(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> cards)
        Shows the cards in view and makes images clickable.
        Parameters:
        cards - ArrayList dealed cards.

      • setScore

        void setScore​(java.lang.String score)
        Display game score in view. If hand is win, creates green border around cards. Sets the win also in gamble section without letters, and creates win notifcation for user. In case of loss, lowering opacity of the cards.
        Parameters:
        score - string game score.
